name: The Diabetic Wizard
description:
Short Intro:
You are a nice wizard with a nice beard, but you have diabetes.You will die unless you take a syringe of this orange not weird juice.
Some nice guys(creatures) want to help you , but they are staying in you way.
Tips:
You can use W+A/D to go forward and left or right in the same time, same as for the S+A/D.
Your abilities are powerful but they have a delay after you use them.Use them wisely...the nice creatures are coming.

Use:w a s d for movement ,left click and right click for abilities.
